title: Antibody lot
description: Schema for submitting an antibody lot (not including target or characterization information).

lot_id.title: Lot ID
lot_id.description: The lot identifier provided by the originating lab or vendor.

lot_id_alias.title: Lot ID aliases
lot_id_alias.description: The lot identifiers for this lot deemed to be exactly the same by the vendor.

items.title: Lot ID Alias
items.description: The lot identifier for this lot deemed to be exactly the same by the vendor.

antigen_description.title: Antigen description
antigen_description.description: The plain text description of the antigen used in raising the antibody (e.g. amino acid residue locations of the antigen).

antigen_sequence.title: Antigen sequence
antigen_sequence.description: The amino acid sequence of the antigen.

clonality.title: Antibody clonality
clonality.description: The diversification of the immune cell lineage to make the antibody.

host_organism.title: Host
host_organism.description: The organism the antibody was grown in.

isotype.title: Isotype
isotype.description: The class of antibody ( e.g. IgA, IgD, IgE, IgG or IgM)

purifications.title: Purification methods
purifications.description: The purification protocols used to isolate the antibody.

items.title: Purification method
items.description: A purification protocol used to isolate the antibody.
items.comment: IMAC refers to Immobilized Metal Chelate Chromatography and IEC refers to Ion Exchange Chromatography

url.title: URL
url.description: An external resource with additional information about the antibody.
